text: Andrew R. Jassy (born January 13, 1968) is an American businessman. Jassy is the CEO of Amazon. He was the CEO of Amazon Web Services (AWS). He is also one of the minority owners of the Seattle Kraken of the National Hockey League. Jassy replaced Jeff Bezos as CEO of Amazon on July 5, 2021. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Amazon (company) Category:Businesspeople from Seattle Category:American chief executives
title: Andy Jassy
